levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vup>shortens massively</>, and attacks now summon icicles over random areas within range. When the icicles fall, all enemies in the area are inflicted with <$ba.cold>Cold</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@cold}</> seconds and dealt <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of Santalla's ATK as Arts damage
